This Tableau dashboard is designed to help sports and fitness clubs in Denmark better understand their membership numbers and how they compare to similar clubs. Built using yearly data from DGI, DIF, and DFF, the dashboard provides an overview of all clubs and their member counts nationwide.

Clubs can use this tool to track their growth, benchmark against others, and identify trends within their category. Whether you’re looking to assess your club’s performance or explore opportunities for improvement, this dashboard offers valuable insights to help you stay competitive and engaged in Denmark’s vibrant sports community. Dive in and see where your club stands! -
